mapper.sql: id, video_name, video_interface, video_url, video_size, video_isonline, video_factoryinfo, video_remark, video_record_time, video_operator
mapper.insert:
insert into video (video_name, video_interface, video_url, video_size, video_isonline, video_factoryinfo, video_remark, video_record_time, video_operator) values
(#{item.videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.videoInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.videoSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.videoIsonline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.videoFactoryinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.videoRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.videoRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.videoOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER})
